aboutText: LLC "Multimodal Logistics Trade" is a growing company that offers a full range of transport services worldwide. We can provide you with the best transportation option for any of your needs. Our team is composed of highly qualified specialists who are flexible, competent and confident in solving any challenges. We will ensure that our service is as convenient and efficient as possible. We are always available to assist you.
